featured.text: This group of islands off the coast of Ecuador has recently contracted Argentine Corporación America to manage the redevelopment of the airport on the island of Baltra.

definition.zh_def: 一種法律上承認的組織，通常由多個人組成，目的是進行商業活動或其他類型的活動。
definition.en_def: A legal entity formed by a group of individuals to conduct business or other activities.
definition.example: The corporation announced its plans to expand into international markets.
